document_data.name: ''Joltshooter''
document_data.creator: [[Yrre|Yrre the Sparkstruck]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Joltshooter''''' was a unique [[bow]] that crafted by the eccentric inventor [[Yrre|Yrre the Sparkstruck]]. It was said to have been their favorite weapon, primarily because of the large spikes that extended out from its shaft.
document_data.Powers: Whenever the wielder of ''Joltshooter'' shot true at their target, a course of electricity shot through their body. This charge was not harmful, bur rather allowed them to move with greater speed and strength.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the bow remained in the possession of Counsellor [[Florrick]].
